variants.Description in input context: This variant may lead to a partial loss-of-function of the PARP1 protein.

Material used.Description: HeLa cells were transiently transfected with the wild-type and mutant PARP1 constructs.

Readout description.Result Description: Relative PARP1 protein expression was reduced by 30% for the variant NM_004379.5:c.2562C>A.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type PARP1 was used as a positive control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: One-way ANOVA followed by Bonferroni's multiple comparison test.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: PARP1 protein expression greater than 80% compared to wild-type.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: PARP1 protein expression less than 70% compared to wild-type.
